title: Oh, Touch The Hem Of His Garment
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c

v1: She only touched the hem of His garment
As to His side she stole,
Amid the crowd that gathered around Him;
v2: She came in fear and trembling before Him,
She knew her Lord had come,
She felt that from Him virtue had healed her,
v3: He turned with "Daughter, be of good comfort,
Thy faith hath made thee whole!"
And peace that passeth all understanding
c1: Oh, touch the hem of His garment,
And thou, too, shalt be free!
His healing pow'r this very hour
Shall give new life to thee!
